---
title: "Apply"
---

* Applicants are asked to provide 4 things:
  1. a short questionnaire (e.g., career stage, research interests, estimated required travel support, self-assessment of coding ability); 
  2. a 1-page  ‘Quad chart’ of your project idea; 
  3. a 1-paragraph description of your project idea; 
  4. a 1-page Curriculum Vitae (with links to website, GitHub handle, Twitter handle, etc.)
